name: Duality of Opposites
description:
Navigate your way through 45 stylish levels in this abstract puzzle game, based around a synergy between two completely different controllable components. In Duality of Opposites, it is up to you to master the switching between black and white to pass through walls, and skillfully outsmart obstacles to reach each goal.


CONTROLS
- Right mouse button: Pause
- Left mouse button: everything else

- R: Restart level shortcut key
- M: Mute game shortcut key
